tool_description: Get detailed featured tag information from Chaturbate. Fast processing. Free up to 10 calls per day.
name: Chaturbate
title: Chaturbate

api_list.name: tags
api_list.description: Retrieves the last 100 top performer tags on chaturbate,

optional_parameters.name: sort_key
optional_parameters.description: Query parameter for sorting the results, allowed values are hashtag, viewer_count and room_count; default value is hashtag

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the amount of tags returned, valid values range from 1 to 100; default value is 100

optional_parameters.name: asc
optional_parameters.description: Boolean for results sorting direction, default value is false.

api_list.name: tag history
api_list.description: Queries up to 4 hours in the last three months of information for a specific Chaturbate tag. The start and end parameters format must be RFC3339

api_list.name: tag
api_list.description: Queries the latest information for a specific Chaturbate tag
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chaturbate3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tags/asian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chaturbate3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chaturbate3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tags/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chaturbate3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
